item.title: Broken clear glass., 2nd October
item.description:

item.title: We use to have drop kerbs, 2nd October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westwood Hill, Forest Hill, London

item.title: Dumped shopping trolly, 2nd October
item.description:

item.title: Gas lamp not working, 2nd October
item.description:
The gas lamp on the church side of the street, opposite Dean Trench, by the mulberry tree is not working and has not worked for a very long time. There is a very faint flicker but no light.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 32, Smith Square, Millbank, London

item.title: Fly tipping outside flat on main bus stop, 2nd October
item.description:
